project_snapshot_md:
# MOVA Skills Lab — Project Snapshot (2025-12-09, after L3_03 normalize→export→verifier workflow)

## 1. Overview
State after adding a lab-level integration workflow that chains normalization (skill.dpp_passport_normalize_basic) → export (env.dpp_export_v1) → verifier read (env.dpp_passport_read_v1). Core remains MOVA 4.0.0; spec/mova-4.1.0-draft is reference only. Branch: feature/dpp-base-pack-v0.1.

## 2. Structure (short)
```
mova_skills_lab/
├── lab/{examples/, skill_runs/, schemas/, env/, tools/}
├── skills/{dpp_passport_normalize_basic, repo_snapshot_basic, mova_check_basic, ...}
├── docs/PROJECT_MEMORY/...
└── core/mova/, spec/mova-4.1.0-draft/
```

## 3. New in DPP (L3_03)
- Added export and verifier envelopes tied to normalized passport (BAT-2025-NORM-001).
- Added integration workflow example `dpp_workflow_L3_03_normalize_export_verifier_example.json` linking normalize→export→verifier.

## 4. Notes
- Workflow is lab-level; execution handled by external services using referenced envelopes and skill runs.
- Builds on L3_02 normalization engine and L2_02/L2_01 envelopes.
